name: Acid
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To download this software, you must also have at least 290MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system's hard disk.
To play this software with your PSP®, the latest system software and a Memory Stick Duo™ with at least 290MB of free space are required.
For more detail information about download to your PSP® system, please see below URL.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.



?Game description
Frantic explosion, compelling soundtracks, gorgeous movies and unstoppable gameplay, all are blended for your utmost enjoyable gaming experience in “Acid”. Deep insight is needed to master the game, but the easy-to-pick-up control will make things a lot easier even for beginners. Staged in a cool cyber space, this game is a knock-out for heavy players. And on top of all the flashy explosion effects and spontaneous sound effects, eye candy visual is also one of the selling points of this must-play title.

Supported Accessories: Wireless Controller (supports vibration feature??
?For vibration feature, the DUALSHOCK®3 Wireless Controller is required.
?For playing with PSP®, single player game play only. Not compatible with multiple user play.

?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick™ capacity requirement
290MB
